- `enabled` (bool) - Enable execution environment

- `image` (string) - Container image to use

- `pull_policy` (string) - Pull policy for the container image

- `container_engine` (string) - Container engine to use (auto, podman, docker)

- `container_options` ([]string) - Additional container runtime options (e.g., --net=host, --security-opt, --user=0:0)

- `pull_arguments` ([]string) - Arguments passed to image pull command

- `environment_variables` (\*EnvironmentVariablesConfig) - Environment variables to pass to the execution environment

- `volume_mounts` ([]VolumeMount) - Volume mounts for the execution environment container
